fields_of_interest: Trade, Consumers, Customs, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Food Safety, Transport
eu_initiatives: ATA has been working with other industry partners in fitness for horses guideline, also in the proces of working together with industry partners on the improvement of way stations.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Advisory Group on the Food Chain and Animal and Plant Health#E00860#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=860#Observer#C#Animal Health Advisory Committee
relevant_communication: yearly conference bringing together stakeholders involved in transporting animals to improve the modes of operations and informing on new practices, laws and other relevant information.
goals__remit: We are a non-profit international trade association dedicated to promoting our members and providing access to necessary resources and education for the safe and humane handling and transport of all animals worldwide.
